Why collect stats if you’re not gonna share them?

examples.title: Examples
examples.caption: Check out a few examples – and build your very own custom overlay in the editor!

facecam.title: Facecam
facecam.text: You’ve keyed out your facecam but don’t know where to put it now? This template helps you seamlessly integrate your cam into the overlay – right above your stats.

handcam.title: Handcam
handcam.text: Tired of stream snipers using your minimap as a radar? A handcam with this template is the perfect add-on – keeps you safe and looks cool. Well, taste may vary.

topbar.title: Topbar
topbar.text: You want to show the full gameplay without losing your stats? This template fits perfectly in the top corner – visible, but never in the way.

sidebar.title: Sidebar
sidebar.text: Kick votes annoy your viewers more than they help? Use this sidebar template – now only your most important stats stay on screen.

section1.title: What is sofc's Stats?
section1.description: sofc's Stats is a tool that lets you integrate your Leetify stats directly into your Twitch overlay. Show your viewers live how you're performing – whether it's K/D, HS rate, or over 50 other metrics.

features.realtime: Real-time data – from your Leetify profile
features.stylish: Stylish overlay – seamlessly fits into your stream
features.automated: Fully automated – set it up once, then sit back and shine

section1.whyDescription: Because your stats aren't just for you – your community loves to see your progress. Whether you're grinding hard or just had a personal highlight: sofc's Stats brings it to your stream.

section2.title: How does sofc's Stats work?
section2.intro: Getting started is super easy – you're ready in just a few steps:

steamId.title: Get your Steam64 ID
steamId.description: You can find it here or directly in your Steam profile link.

leetifyAccount.title: Create a free account on Leetify
leetifyAccount.description: No worries, it only takes a few minutes!

privacy.title: Make sure your Leetify match history is set to 'public'
privacy.description:
This is important so sofc's Stats can access your data.
We do not store any login credentials – your data remains yours. Security & privacy are our top priority.

addSteamId.title: Enter your Steam64 ID into the <router-link to="/editor">editor</router-link>
addSteamId.description: You’ll then receive a personalized link for your overlay.

editOverlay.title: Customize your overlay as needed
editOverlay.description: The editor will generate your personal link, which you can later re-import into the editor.

addToOBS.title: Add the overlay to OBS or Streamlabs
addToOBS.description: Insert your personal link into OBS or Streamlabs as a browser source. Your stats are now live.
